name: Sunvine Shrine
text: Activate this card by sending 1 card from your hand to the GY while you control a "Sunavalon" Link Monster. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Plant monsters. Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Plant Normal Monster from your GY. During your opponent's End Phase: You can send this face-up card from the field to the GY, then target 1 Continuous Trap in your GY; Set it to your Spell & Trap Zone.
